formattedAddress: 1675 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1675 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Marie is amazing!!! Literally a fairy godmother of wedding dresses! I knew I always wanted to wear my mother's dress from her 70's wedding but with some updates. I searched everywhere and finally found My Metro Fit. Marie was so great and understanding from the start. I would recommend Marie for anything you need with your dress alteration needs! She does it all. We kept the skirt of my mom's dress and re-did the bodice. Marie hand stitched all of the embroidered flowers back on to my new dress. She even re-used the beads to make new cuffs! 10000% recommend My Metro Fit!

originalText.text: Marie was such a pleasure to work with!! After a manufacturer error, my dress was made too short. I didn't have much time to fix it, but Marie worked so quickly to fix the hem and tailor the rest of the dress which included a lot of detailed lace work. She also made a custom matching veil and tailored my mom's dress exactly the way she wanted it. Everything looked so perfect! I can't imagine what I would have done without her! Thank you ❤️

text.text: Marie was such a pleasure to work with!! After a manufacturer error, my dress was made too short. originalText.text: Marie is absolutely one of a kind! She altered my wedding dress with the utmost care and really made me comfortable and confident throughout the process! She is extremely talented and wants you to look your absolute best! I cannot say enough good things about her craft, her timeliness, her flexibility, her creativity and her caring personality! I have gone to her for other projects as well and I have always been beyond satisfied. I would recommend her again and again and again! I can confidently say that I felt amazing on my wedding day because of her. Thank you again, Marie for all that you do!

text.text: Marie is absolutely one of a kind! She altered my wedding dress with the utmost care and really made me comfortable and confident throughout the process! originalText.text:
Marie is absolutely incredible! I brought in a dress that I thought fit pretty well, but we ended up reconstructing it and it made A WORLD of difference. Marie is an expert and I am so glad I was able to work with her for such an important day. A few weekends later, I saw someone else get married in the same dress and I have to say, Marie’s work on my dress really elevated the look.

10/10 recommend Marie! One of the best decisions I made for my wedding!

Oh, she also made my veil and it was PERFECT!

originalText.text: Beautiful and professional work! Marie made my dress fit like a glove! Everyone was talking about how beautiful and perfect it was all night! She made sure we had multiple fittings and that everything is perfect! She is professional and has such great energy! Every fitting felt like meeting with a friend! She also helped arrange the dry cleaning and getting the dress ready! Would recommend her any day!
